key.name: update-notifier-project-version
key.summary: The project version of when an update notification was shown

key.name: update-notifier-enabled
key.summary: Enable/Disable the update notifications

key.name: prefs-visible-page
key.summary: Which page to show when settings window is opened. Empty string is default.

key.name: hide-dash
key.summary: Hide GNOME Overview Dash

key.name: isolate-workspaces
key.summary: Isolate running apps by current workspace

key.name: panel-on-all-monitors
key.summary: Show a panel on all monitors

key.name: panel-location
key.summary: Panel location. TOP or BOTTOM

key.name: isolate-monitors
key.summary: Isolate running apps by current monitors

key.name: main-panel-height
key.summary: Change the height of GNOME top panel

key.name: always-show-notifications
key.summary: Always show App Icon notification bagdes, even when 'Do Not Disturb' is on

key.name: show-panel-activities-button
key.summary: Show/Hide the activities button in panel

key.name: show-running-apps
key.summary: Show/Hide running apps icons

key.name: favorites
key.summary: Show GNOME favorites as AppIcons

key.name: favorites-on-all-monitors
key.summary: Show GNOME favorites as AppIcons on all monitors

key.name: show-apps-button
key.summary: Enable a Show Apps Button. 0 = left, 1 = right

key.name: window-previews
key.summary: Show window previews for running apps

key.name: window-previews-size-scale
key.summary: Window previews size scale

key.name: window-previews-show-timeout
key.summary: Delay for showing window previews (ms)

key.name: window-previews-hide-timeout
key.summary: Delay for hiding window previews (ms)

key.name: window-preview-click-action
key.summary: Window Previews click action

key.name: window-preview-show-minimize-button
key.summary: Show minimize window button on window previews

key.name: window-preview-button-size
key.summary: Close/Minimize button size

key.name: window-preview-button-icon-size
key.summary: Close/Minimize button icon size

key.name: window-preview-app-icon-size
key.summary: Close/Minimize button icon size

key.name: window-preview-title-font-size
key.summary: Window preview title font size

key.name: window-preview-button-spacing
key.summary: Window previews spacing between buttons

key.name: peek-windows
key.summary: Peek to window when mouse over a window previews

key.name: peek-windows-timeout
key.summary: Peek to window delay in ms

key.name: peek-windows-opacity
key.summary: Peek to window - opacity of inactive windows. 0 - 255

key.name: multi-window-indicator
key.summary: Show an indicator when app has multiple windows

key.name: multi-window-indicator-style
key.summary: Multiple window indicator style

key.name: indicator-location
key.summary: AppIcon indicator location. TOP or BOTTOM

key.name: indicator-color-running
key.summary: AppIcon running indicator color

key.name: indicator-color-focused
key.summary: AppIcon focused indicator color

key.name: dance-urgent
key.summary: Dance AppIcons when marked Urgent

key.name: unity-badges
key.summary: Enable Unity Badges Counter on AppIcons

key.name: unity-progress-bars
key.summary: Enable Unity Progress Bars on AppIcons

key.name: notification-badges
key.summary: Enable Notification Badges Counter on AppIcons

key.name: tool-tips
key.summary: Show tool-tips for AppIcons

key.name: icon-size
key.summary: Icon size for the AppIcons

key.name: click-action
key.summary: Left Click action for running AppIcons

key.name: middle-click-action
key.summary: Middle Click action for running AppIcons

key.name: shift-middle-click-action
key.summary: Shift + Middle Click action for running AppIcons

key.name: scroll-action
key.summary: Scroll action for running AppIcons

key.name: position-in-panel
key.summary: Position in panel. LEFT, CENTER, or RIGHT

key.name: position-offset
key.summary: Position in the selected panel-box

key.name: clock-position-in-panel
key.summary: Clock Position in panel. LEFT, CENTER, or RIGHT

key.name: clock-position-offset
key.summary: Clock offset position

key.name: clock-font-size
key.summary: Change the font size of the panel clock

key.name: desaturation-factor
key.summary: Desaturate effect for AppIcons. 0.0 - 1.0

key.name: icon-style
key.summary: AppIcon icon style. REGULAR or SYMBOLIC

key.name: override-panel-clock-format
key.summary: Change the height of GNOME top panel

key.name: show-weather-by-clock
key.summary: Show current weather by panel clock.
